title: Charming Palo Alto Stay in Silicon Valley with Onsite Restaurant, Resort-Style Pool & Jacuzzi
description: Whether for work or pleasure, stay connected to the vibrant energy of Silicon Valley with a stay at Crowne Plaza Palo Alto, an IHG Hotel. Located in the centre of the tech capital, this hotel offers easy access to Stanford University, Googleplex and the charming downtown areas of Palo Alto and Mountain View. Relax in the sparkling resort-style outdoor pool, bubbling jacuzzi or dine indoors or alfresco at Cabana Cove between adventures.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Palo Alto, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 4300 El Camino Real, Palo Alto, California 94306, USA
